column5: Private Room with a cozy King Size Bed. Just around the corner from the TPC JW Marriott in far north San Antonio... Easy access to Hwy 281 & Loop 1604, just minutes from great shopping, dining & entertainment. Roughly 15-20 minutes to the Airport & only 20-25 minutes to downtown SA and the Riverwalk...  The room is comfy, quiet & has access to private full Bathroom.
column8: Private King Room North SA - Near TPC JW Marriott
